title: Why does riot encourage me to be toxic?
body:
I'm new, really new. If I get matched up against players in pvp who are clearly way more experienced almost every game then clearly matchmaking is broken. I just don't care about being a "nice" player, I'll insta lock every game because I only have a few champs I'm familiar with and I'm 100% going to feed or afk till end or log out and log into another acc if i'm stuck in a game with smurfs.
Fix matchmaking and stop encouraging negative shit like this ffs, not hard.
